"What? You want to know why I became an: "You know the answer to that and you still want to ask me?"
"You know, asking questions you already know the answers to is a good shortcut to getting hated."
"But I'll humor you. I became and idol simply because I was ordered to."
"It might be fun to get the chance to talk to an idol, but there's something I should mention."
"If any unnecessary information gets leaked, then I'll have to use my other role, so be careful."
"The information I gave you right now is strictly a secret, got it?"
"Hm, I don't know why, but when I talk to you I tend to say too much..."
"Maybe it's because I'm not used to talking? Anyway, keep your pie hole shut and it'll be okay."
"I may have been ordered into this role, but somehow it feels like fate..."
"That by singing I can somehow bring happiness to others. That... makes me feel good."
